text: Christopher "Chris" Moffat (born September 22, 1979) is a Canadian luger who has competed since 2000. Competing in three Winter Olympics, he earned his best finish of fifth in the men's doubles event at Salt Lake City in 2002.2002 luge men's doubles results Moffat's best finish at the FIL World Luge Championships was tenth in the men's doubles event at Oberhof, Germany in 2008.2006 luge men's doubles results He resides in his hometown of Calgary, Alberta in the offseason. Moffat had a screw removed from his wrist following a fracture to stabilize it.FIL-Luge.org October 24, 2008 article on Lauscher's surgery, including Chris Moffat. - accessed October 24, 2008. ==References== == External links == * * * * Category:1979 births Category:Canadian male lugers Category:Living people Category:Lugers at the 2002 Winter Olympics Category:Lugers at the 2006 Winter Olympics Category:Lugers at the 2010 Winter Olympics Category:Olympic lugers of Canada Category:Sportspeople from Alberta
title: Chris Moffat
